# EU AI Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689)

## Key Clauses
- **Art. 6:** High-risk classification
- **Art. 14:** Human oversight
- **Art. 12:** Logging

## iLuminara Relevance
- FRENASA high-risk conformity; SHAP oversight
- Amplifies MDR clinical grade

## Amplification Synergy
- Amplifies: MDR, GDPR

## Data-Driven Law Proposal
- If >90% prevention efficacy, propose new high-risk class for outbreak AI
